headline: Trump Greenlights More Oil-and-Gas Investments in Venezuela

headline: Exclusive-Venezuela's PDVSA selling oil only to individually licensed companies, sources say
summary: HOUSTON, Feb 13 (Reuters) - Venezuela's state-run oil company PDVSA has refused to sell oil to companies without individual U. licenses in the past two weeks, four sources from companies seeking to buy cargoes told Reuters, limiting exports and preventing the country from draining brimming storage tanks ‌faster.
